reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've just finished a 5 night stay at Puri Bambu hotel and everything was absolutely marvelous, except for the location! It's great that the beach is nearby and there's a busy street with shops, restaurants & supermarkets close by as well, but it's dangerous to walk on this street at night because there's no lighting and buses/cars barely fit the narrow lane and are always threatening to run you over! On our first night, we decided to go get drinks/snacks at the supermarket and walked on the left side of the road which was a big mistake because there's a ditch you can't see in the dark and my husband fell into it while walking! I know it's a fault of the city, not the hotel, but when you put a hotel up somewhere you should do something to get the city to fix this problem! Or at least put up some lights around the hotel.
reviews.title: Great except for the dark narrow street it's on!

reviews.text: Apart from this scary road making the location less than desireable, I can't complain much. The room was huge and spacious - it almost felt like it needed more furniture, maybe a table and chairs? The bed was quite comfortable. Air con didn't seem to work too good and was kind of noisy, but it seems that's how it is most places in Indonesia. You have to pay for wi-fi, but it's not too expensive @ 50,000 IDR for 10 hours. Staff were pleasant and helpful.
reviews.title: Puri Bambu ticks all the boxes for value and friendly service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've been staying at Puri bambu over new year's eve 2007-2008 and have really been satisfied about the hotel appeareance, cleanliness, rooms and pool. The only issue is that even it's rather far from the beach, not really walking distance and the road is not the one you pleasently walk by. There is the opportunity to rent motorbike and the hotel can facilitate.
reviews.title: A little gem away from the busy and noisy Kuta

reviews.text: Breakfast and food in general are great. It's a good value for money hotel not far from Kuta and almost by Jimbaran shore, always to be considered during your stay in Bali
reviews.title: Great value basic hotel does it all right

reviews.text: stayed here in june at beginning of our trip and again last 3 days. we liked it very much. the pool is cleaned every morning. the rooms get cleaned every day;new towels and 2 bottles of water. breakfast is included and is a buffet. some things change every day. thought it was wonderful! the beach is a short stroll away. and the have a free shuttlebus to Kuta a few times a day. well worth it. i did that twice and it's great, you get back to your nice hotel at the end of your trip to Kuta. the staff is super friendly and they want to help you with every thing you ask. they also state their price in us$. but if you book in advance through the internet, you get a great price. once there and you want to book a room, bargain. standard room is 65us$, but we got it for 500.000 rp. prices through internet can be as low as 56nz$. we enjoyed it very much!
reviews.title: great, clean place to chill

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for 4 nights in the middle of may. The hotel was exceptional value for money. Very clean, and great service with a smile. The setting was a hidden away gem down a back alley not too far from the beach, just watch out for the snakes. Staff were on hand to provide local knowledge, tips and tours. The only real negative I could say about this hotel is that the hotel caters very much towards the french and german markets. In general I would recommend this hotel as a cheap, clean and well poisitioned hideway from the hustle and bustle of kuta beach. Boss Boss 1 dollar. Also prepare yourself for the bintang hang in the mornings.
reviews.title: A great hotel if you do not mind les francais & der deutsch!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is a small hotel situated around a pool with a swim up bar. We only spent one night here but enjoyed it. We lazed by the pool and went for a walk to the beach to enjoy seafood at the warungs (tip - don't eat at the expensive warungs on the beach closest to the hotel - keep walking south for about 10 minutes and you will come to another group of them which are half the price!)
reviews.title: Good option for a quiet stay

reviews.text: We ate at the hotel , the food was fairly average, not as spicy as we had expected - probably toned down for the western palate. Big comfy room with a balcony overlooking the pool.
reviews.title: Near to airport, value for money!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall a nice place to stay, if not very exciting. Jimbaran was a bit disappointing - the beach was very dirty, the only attraction being the seafood warungs.
reviews.title: Service is very good, homey feeling staff. location not good.

reviews.text: I have left it nearly a year to post my opinion, but I wrote the review the day after my return but due to family tragedy have only managed to post it today. Re-reading it captured my memories of the place that has a very special place in my heart.
reviews.title: huge rooms, good service, beyond expectations
